title: Meditation in motion
creator_credit: Irene Angelico, Tom Daly and ONF | NFB
brief_description: A short lyrical document about an ancient Oriental discipline, this film moves from the streets of China, where the people practice Tai-Chi daily, to North America, where the same movements are executed by a solitary figure in a park. Tai-chi ch’uan performed by Leslie Orr. (Award: New York)
